channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Engineering Requirements Quality Assistant
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Engineering Requirements Quality Assistant

item.title: CVE-2020-4663|2024-08-04T08:07:49.139Z -- ibm -- engineering%20requirements%20quality%20assistant
item.description: IBM Engineering Requirements Quality Assistant On-Premises is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 186234.

item.title: CVE-2020-4664|2024-08-04T08:07:49.127Z -- ibm -- engineering%20requirements%20quality%20assistant

item.title: CVE-2020-4667|2024-08-04T08:07:49.163Z -- ibm -- engineering%20requirements%20quality%20assistant
item.description: IBM Engineering Requirements Quality Assistant On-Premises could allow an authenticated user to obtain sensitive information due to improper input validation. IBM X-Force ID: 186282.
